description:
"Brain-like" Knowledge Management Notes


[New] Provide a switch for paired punctuation marks, which is turned on by default and can be turned off manually
[Optimize] Export to Word to keep paragraph spacing and indentation consistent with Office
[Optimize] Solve some problems with PDF export
[Optimize] Improve some details of Sequece reading experience
[Optimize] Solve the problem that the synchronization lock is not correctly canceled
